Class Die

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.Die
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Die
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class used to represent a Die
    Author:
    Matteo Gagliano, Carmelo Fascella, Generoso Imparato
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Die(it.polimi.se2018.utils.Color color)
      Constructor that creates a Die of the color passed by parameter and random value (range 1 to 6)

      Copy constructor

      • isSameDie

        public boolean isSameDie(Die die)
        This method checks if the Die passed by parameter is exactly the same of this Die. Concretely it checks if the Id are the same.
        Parameters:
        die - die to confront
        Returns:
        true if the die are the same, false otherwise
